channel.title: "java is not recognised as a operable program"
channel.description:
hi im stuck coz they removed the awnser on this , on how to make the server , so if anyone could tell me what i have to put in enviormental variubles , in path and class path and which one to put it in , thx that would be a real help :P if anyone could PLEASE help me :P.
galan530

i know , but thats what i need to find out , moparscape deleted god of ikili’s way on how to make a server and its on it.
[/quote]how dont you know where you installed java if you installed java?
also, wrong section. so GTFO. go to the RS2 development/HELP section, not the RSC DEVELOPMENT section

what the fuck is wrong with you. Calm the hell down.[/quote]

He’s pissed because these 5 year olds can’t read, so the entire board is filled with WAT IS JVA HOW I STRT!!!11 :(:(:(:(. It’s getting rather annoying but oh well I guess.
